name: Aphelandra
text: Activate: Main You may return this Character to the owner's hand: If your Leader has the (Amazon Lily) type, place up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

effect.text: You may return this Character to the owner's hand: If your Leader has the (Amazon Lily) type, place up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark, but this is not a game error. The card ID, set, number, and other fields are read from the printed text.
